name: UTakeRecorderSources
doc: A list of sources to record for any given take. Stored as meta-data on ULevelSequence through ULevelSequence::FindMetaData<UTakeRecorderSources>

methods.name: AddSource
GetSourcesCopy
methods.doc:
Retrieves a copy of the list of sources that are being recorded. This is intended for Blueprint usages which cannot
use TArrayView.
DO NOT MODIFY THIS ARRAY, modifications will be lost.

methods.name: RemoveSource
methods.doc:
Remove the specified source from this list

@param InSource        The source to remove

methods.name: StartRecordingSource
methods.doc: Calls the recording initialization flows on each of the specified sources.
